channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: People with intellectual disabilities do lots of jobs–but they don't direct air traffic
item.description: After the fatal crash over the Potomac River, the President says diversity hiring has made the skies unsafe, but that's not how disability hiring works
item.content:encoded:
After the fatal crash over the Potomac River, the President says diversity hiring has made the skies unsafe, but that's not how disability hiring works

(Image credit: Chip Somodevilla)
item.dc:creator: Joseph Shapiro

item.title: Q&A: OpenAI on rival DeepSeek and partnering with the government
item.description: OpenAI — the company behind ChatGPT and a big part of Stargate — is partnering with the U.S. National Laboratories. NPR's Mary Louise Kelly spoke with OpenAI's Chris LeHane, here are the highlights.
item.content:encoded:
OpenAI — the company behind ChatGPT and a big part of Stargate — is partnering with the U.S. National Laboratories. NPR's Mary Louise Kelly spoke with OpenAI's Chris LeHane, here are the highlights.

(Image credit: Julia Demaree Nikhinson/AP)
item.dc:creator: Mary Louise Kelly

item.title: RFK Jr., Trump's pick for HHS, grilled about vaccines again in Day 2 hearing
item.description: More dramatic questioning on vaccines in RFK Jr's second confirmation hearing. Bond/Simmons-Duffin/Stone/Webber
item.content:encoded:
More dramatic questioning on vaccines in RFK Jr's second confirmation hearing. Bond/Simmons-Duffin/Stone/Webber

(Image credit: Kevin Dietsch)
item.dc:creator: Shannon Bond

item.title: Questions about helicopter's path could prove key in Pentagon probe of midair crash
item.description: Among the unanswered questions about the crash near Washington, D.C., are the flight pattern of the Black Hawk helicopter and the exact nature of its training exercise.
item.content:encoded:
Among the unanswered questions about the crash near Washington, D.C., are the flight pattern of the Black Hawk helicopter and the exact nature of its training exercise.

(Image credit: Al Drago)
item.dc:creator: Tom Bowman

item.title: FDA upgrades recall of Lay's potato chips to most serious level
item.description: The problem ingredient identified was "undeclared milk," which poses a risk to those with severe sensitivities or allergies.
item.content:encoded:
The problem ingredient identified was "undeclared milk," which poses a risk to those with severe sensitivities or allergies.

(Image credit: Justin Sullivan)
item.dc:creator: Manuela López Restrepo

item.title: Census Bureau Director Robert Santos is resigning, making way for Trump's pick
item.description: Census Bureau Director Robert Santos is resigning, giving President Trump an early opportunity to nominate an appointee to lead the bureau during key preparations for the 2030 census.
item.content:encoded:
Census Bureau Director Robert Santos is resigning, giving President Trump an early opportunity to nominate an appointee to lead the bureau during key preparations for the 2030 census.

(Image credit: Mariam Zuhaib)
item.dc:creator: Hansi Lo Wang

item.title: Antidepressants harder to quit than heroin? Fact-checking RFK Jr.
item.description: Fact checking RFK Jr.: No, antidepressants are not harder to quit than heroin.
item.content:encoded:
Fact checking RFK Jr.: No, antidepressants are not harder to quit than heroin.

(Image credit: Joe Raedle)
item.dc:creator: Brian Mann

item.title: Map: See the aircraft's paths before they collided near Washington, D.C.
item.description: Investigators say there are likely no survivors in the deadly aircraft collision that occurred Wednesday evening above the icy waters of the Potomac river.
item.content:encoded:
Investigators say there are likely no survivors in the deadly aircraft collision that occurred Wednesday evening above the icy waters of the Potomac river.

(Image credit: Al Drago)
item.dc:creator: Alana Wise

item.title: Listen: Air traffic controller audio before the midair plane crash near D.C.
item.description: It will be some time before investigators can offer clear answers to the cause of the midair crash at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport, but air traffic controller audio and radar reviewed by NPR offer some insight into what happened before the collision.
item.content:encoded:
It will be some time before investigators can offer clear answers to the cause of the midair crash at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport, but air traffic controller audio and radar reviewed by NPR offer some insight into what happened before the collision.

(Image credit: Carolyn Kaster)
item.dc:creator: Jaclyn Diaz

item.title: Trump suggests that deadly airliner crash was the result of diversity hiring
item.description: Without evidence, President Trump and other administration officials claimed that DEI programs led to Wednesday's fatal air crash. DEI has recently become a common talking point to blame disasters on.
item.content:encoded: Without evidence, President Trump and other administration officials claimed that DEI programs led to Wednesday's fatal air crash. DEI has recently become a common talking point to blame disasters on.
item.dc:creator: Lisa Hagen
